title: Ant world
brief_description: Shows the life style of the common ant. Tells how the class structure of certain ant colonies constitutes a society based on a division of labour. Records home-building and food-gathering techniques and documents the exchange of a salivery substance between a smaller male and larger female ant. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
